statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 10 \\ -10 \\ -5 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 17 \\ -17 \\ -9 \\ -30 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
